description:
At Chowdeck, we deliver happiness straight to you, one delicious meal at a time.

Africa’s leading on-demand online food delivery service, Chowdeck, offers quick and convenient food delivery from hundreds of your favourite restaurants! Browse our extensive food menu, order food online, and enjoy fast and reliable delivery right to your door. Say goodbye to long queues and waiting time with Chowdeck!

Enjoy a variety of cuisines, including:

- African & Fast Food (Jollof rice, Pasta, Burgers, Waakye, Kelewele)
- Asian (Chinese, Indian, Japanese, and Lebanese)
- Drinks (Alcoholic and Non-Alcoholic)
- Mexican (Tacos)
- Halal friendly
- Healthy / Vegetarian (Breakfast, Smoothies, Fresh Fruit Juices)
- Pastries (Cakes, Cookies, Meat pies, Sausage rolls) and more.

Eat your favourite meals where you like! Chowdeck delivers food in numerous cities in Accra, Lagos and Abuja, including Yaba, Alausa, Ikoyi, Ogudu, Wuse, Gwarinpa, Lekki, Victoria Island, Ikeja, Surulere, Festac, Amuwo Odofin, Egbeda, Alimosho, Gbagada, Ikoyi, Jahi, Maitama, Garki, Jabi, Utako, Mabushi, Katampe, Kado Wuye, Apo, Gudu, Life Camp, 1st Avenue, Asokoro, Jahi, Wuse and Central Areas with ongoing expansions to other major cities across the continent.

With Chowdeck, order food online and get it delivered to you immediately or at a scheduled time. Alternatively, order ahead online and pick it up at your favourite restaurants.

Get notified from when the restaurant accepts your meal to when it arrives. Track your meal every second of the way between the restaurant and delivery.

Our restaurant partners include Honeysuckle, Papa's Pizza, Mega Chicken, Ajishafe, Burger King, Mama JB Takeout Restaurant, Jay’s Diner, King Glab, Korede Spaghetti, Panarotti’s Pizza, Fruits2Go, Amoke Oge, Saminu Kilishi, KFC, Debonair’s Pizza, Mr Biggs, Yakoyo, Labule, Red Gourmet Kitchen, El Padrino’s, Iyan Aladuke, The Place, Cubana Fish, DO Bowls, Food Fusion, Johnny Rocket, Papiees Maestro, Keje Grill, Ojuelegba Restaurant, So Fresh, Eden Life, Korean Wife’s Table, Squizz’d, Cookie Nation, Old English, and more.

Shop your groceries online easily from leading supermarkets, including Blenco, FoodCo and Domino Supermarket. Buy household needs, including beauty and cosmetics, self-care, baby food, pet needs, snacks, drinks, cleaning supplies and grocery staples such as bread, milk, chocolates, coffee, sugar, fruits, vegetables, frozen foods, and alcoholic beverages.

The Chowdeck Lifestyle is marked by ease and enjoyment. We offer our beloved customers unique perks like discounts, free delivery, and promotions through our in-app loyalty program and partnerships with local and international companies.

What are you waiting for? Order food online with Chowdeck and enjoy fast, convenient delivery wherever you are!

- Enter your location and find restaurants and supermarkets delivering to your location.
- Browse meals and products listed from restaurants and supermarkets near you.
- Pay online, sit back, and relax.
- Track your order in real-time in-app and through notifications.
- Rate and review your experience.

Any questions? Contact our Support team at https://chowdeck.com/contact

We are available on:
- Website - https://chowdeck.com
- Instagram - https://instagram.com/chowdeck
- Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/chowdeck
- Twitter - https://twitter.com/chowdeck
- TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@chowdeck

FoodCourt is the best food delivery app in Lagos!
Satisfy your cravings with delicious food & drink from the best restaurant close to you using the FoodCourt app. Skip the queue, track your food in real-time, and enjoy home delivery of your favorite meals and drinks to your doorstep.



GOOD FOOD ONLY
Choose from a curation of the best restaurants around you for delicious meals! Relax and have fun with friends and family, or share romantic moments with your partner while we get your food & drink delivered to your doorstep in minutes!
If you’re too busy with work to step out to go get some food, we’ll make sure you never go hungry. Give your work the full attention it requires while we get your favorite meal delivered to you in minutes.
All you need to do to enjoy all of these is download the FoodCourt app and place that order!


YOUR CRAVINGS SATISFIED IN MINUTES
For you, we’ve got tasty food only. Discover the best restaurants and cuisines in Lagos and order tasty meals well prepared for your enjoyment. Amala, eba, or pounded yam? Receive delivery of these with your favorite soup! Burger, ice cream, waffles; you name it, we’ve got it! You need not go so far to get your favorite food & drink. Relax on your sofa and order using the FoodCourt app. 
On the FoodCourt app, your friends and family get their favorite meal and you can check out these varieties of delicacies in one single order! Place orders for Chinese rice, burger, jollof rice, pounded yam and checkout with this variety and have them all delivered to your doorstep in minutes!


ORDER WITH EASE
Buy your favorite burger, drink, and ice cream using the FoodCourt app. Checkout with several orders from a variety of food brands - one basket in a single order! Have it brought to your doorstep by delivery people in minutes and avoid the stress of going to shops or stores to buy them. 
Place as many orders as you like from the comfort of your home for yourself, friends, and family. 


SEAMLESS PAYMENT SYSTEM
Fund your FC wallet on the FoodCourt app and enjoy a food delivery service with no hassle. The price of your order is simply deducted from your wallet and your food is delivered to your doorstep in minutes. 


TRACK YOUR FOOD IN REAL TIME
Enjoy a flawless food delivery service. Get notified of the progress of your order from confirmation, to the estimated delivery time, up to the point it is delivered to your doorstep. Get informed when your order arrives. For top-notch food delivery, Download the FoodCourt app now.


FOOD BRANDS INCLUDE:
Sunnyside club, Eat Frankies, Jollof and Co, Mama’s Native, Sweet Treats, The Cocktail Club, Wing Kings, ChōW Asian, Wrap City. Exclusively on the FoodCourt app!


HOW IT WORKS

*Set up your account to discover the best restaurants around you.
*Browse the best food brands for tasty meals ranging from delicious jollof rice to gourmet burgers, Asian dishes, seafood, waffles, pancakes, shawarma, and more!
*Great drink delivery from the best drink brands. Alcoholic or non-alcoholic drinks? You decide!
*Shop for snacks, drinks, and ice cream in the FC shop and checkout with several brands in a single order.
*Track the progress of your food & drink from the confirmation point up until it is delivered to your doorstep!
*Look out for periodic discounts to enjoy sweet deals.






WHY USE FOODCOURT?

Order from the comfort of wherever you are, for yourself, friends and family. 
Have the best alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks brought to the party!
Delicious meals prepared for your enjoyment.
Shop your favorite ice cream, burger as well as essentials.
Track your food in real-time.


SUPPORTED AREAS
 
Lekki
Ikoyi
Ikeja
Victoria Island
Surulere
Marina
Magodo
Yaba
Victoria Garden City
Gbagada






Visit getfoodcourt.com for more information!

Conveniently order Domino’s from anywhere on your iPhone. Build your Domino's pizza just the way you like it or choose one of our pre-built pizzas. Add items from the rest of our oven-baked menu including chicken, bread, drinks, and desserts. And with the Domino’s Tracker ® you can follow your order from the moment you place it until it’s out for delivery, dine-in, carryout or pickup.

FEATURES:
· Create a Domino's Pizza Profile to easily access to your saved info and recent orders (not required)
· Order faster than ever by creating an Easy Order!
· Use Domino’s Tracker notifications to follow your pizza order until it’s out for delivery or ready for pickup!

The Place Loyalty App – Your Rewards, Your Way!  

At The Place, we truly appreciate our customers' continuous patronage and loyalty. That’s why we’ve created The Place Loyalty App—a seamless way to pay, earn, and enjoy exclusive benefits every time you visit our stores! 

With The Place Loyalty App, you can: 

• Load Your Wallet & Pay with Ease
Top up your wallet within the app and enjoy a fast, cashless, and hassle-free payment experience. Our "Scan & Pay" feature lets you pay instantly at any of our outlets, making transactions smoother and more convenient. 

• Earn Rewards on Every Purchase
We believe loyalty should be rewarded! Each time you make a purchase using the app, you earn exciting rewards that can be redeemed for future purchases. The more you pay, the more you earn!

• Redeem & Spend Your Rewards
Your earned rewards can be redeemed directly in-store to pay for your favorite meals, snacks, or beverages. Enjoy the benefits of paying with us while spending less!

• Send & Share Gift Cards
Spread the love by sending digital gift cards to friends, family, or colleagues straight from the app! Whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, or just to show appreciation, giving the gift of great food has never been easier.

• Join Raffles & Win Amazing Prizes
Want more excitement? Participate in our exclusive raffles for a chance to win fantastic prizes! Just by using the app, you get opportunities to enter and walk away with incredible rewards.

Why Download The Place Loyalty App?
•  Convenient cashless payments at all our stores  
•  Earn and redeem rewards effortlessly
•  Gift your loved ones with instant gift cards
•  Exclusive raffles for exciting prizes
•  Fast, secure, and user-friendly experience

All these amazing benefits are our way of saying THANK YOU for choosing The Place!

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Craving your favorite meal? Get Food delivers delicious dishes from a variety of local and national restaurants right to your doorstep. Simply browse, order, and enjoy. Plus, track your order live from start to finish!

ORDER FROM TOP RESTAURANTS
Browse an extensive range of cuisines, from your favorite comfort foods to exotic international dishes. Get Food makes it easy to quickly order from the best restaurants in town and get your meals delivered faster.

ORDER AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Skip the wait! Order food ahead for pickup. Select your favorite dishes, add them to your cart, and head straight to the restaurant—no lines, no hassle.

REAL-TIME TRACKING
-Stay in the loop with real-time order tracking.
-See exactly when your food will arrive with live updates.
-Get notified as your order is on the way and when it reaches your door.

SECURE PAYMENT OPTIONS
Pay securely with your debit card, bank transfer, or USSD—whichever is easiest for you.

EXCLUSIVE PROMOTIONS
Unlock monthly promotions and exclusive coupon codes to save more on your next meal. With Get Food, dining just got even more affordable.

Dodo Pizza is perfect for a quick bite, a cozy family dinner, or a fun get-together with friends. It’s more than just fast food — we create our own recipes, work with trusted suppliers, and maintain quality at every step. So your food is always delicious, and delivery — fast.
CHOOSE AND ENJOY
– Hot pizzas on crispy crust with our signature sauce
– Tasty snacks — from light to hearty
– Delicious desserts for those with a sweet tooth
– Milkshakes and refreshing drinks
– Aromatic coffee for an energy boost
– Hearty breakfasts to start the day right
– Value combos to save


BUILD YOUR OWN PIZZA
– Try two flavors in one pizza
– Add or remove toppings
– Choose crust thickness


JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
– Earn dodocoins — our in-app currency — and spend them on products
– Get personalized offers and discounts, including birthday deals


ORDER YOUR WAY
– Fast delivery to your door
– Takeaway when you’re nearby
– Table ordering in-store

TRACK YOUR ORDER
– Watch your pizza being prepared via live camera in the kitchen
– Track your courier on the map in real time

HAVE FUN WHILE YOU WAIT
– Stack pizza boxes in a fun mini-game
– Create your own stickerboard for in-store display


TRAVEL WITH US
Dodo has over 1300 restaurants in 20+ countries — and just one app. No need to reinstall anything when you’re abroad. Menu, delivery, offers, and service — everything works as usual.
Download the app now and order food in just a few taps. We do our best to keep it tasty, fast, and reliable. 
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out at mobile@dodopizza.com

With the Pizza Jungle app, anyone can simply use a mobile device to look over our numerous delicacies. All you need to do is to place an order, and pick up in-store or have it delivered to your doorstep.




FEATURES:
- Create your Pizza Jungle Profile to enable you access recent orders (Optional)
- Select Pizza Jungle store closest to you
- Place your Order fast without creating a profile
- Track your Orders from the Pizza Jungle App
- Select 2 sides of Pizza Jungle and add as many Topping as you desire.

Features:
- Access to the complete Chicken republic menu including all our best online deals, desserts, sides and more.
- Ability to quickly place orders in just a few clicks.
- Create a list of your saved favourites for quick and easy ordering.
- Ordering through the app.
- Choose to pay online before delivery.
- Pay safely with a credit card.

All advantages at a glance:
• The design is clearer, cleaner and cooler than ever!
• A better overview. Useful updates:
--- Delivery costs are clearly displayed.
• New! Choose whether you want to pick up your food or have it delivered.
• Popular dishes: an overview of the restaurant's most popular dishes.
• Log in with an existing account or create a new one.

We are constantly improving:
Loving it? Leave a review! The Chicken Republic (Delta Mall) app has regular updates and new features. Do you have tips, ideas or any other feedback for our app? Contact us at support@chickenrepublicdeltamall.com.
we'll gladly answer!
Introducing Vendor Hub -- an easy way for you to manage your menu and orders from Chowdeck!

This is swirl & indulgence in your pocket. With a few taps on your phone, get ready to take your taste bud to a whole new level of deliciousness right from the comfort of your home, office, school.
It’s truly indulgence in your pocket as ordering for your favourite treats from Spur or Panarottis just got a lot more convenient. You can now order any delicious meal or pizza of your choice and have it delivered to you within minutes with just a few taps of on phone.

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Foodelo – Your Go-To Food & Grocery Delivery App!


Foodelo offers fast, reliable, and affordable food delivery from top restaurants, as well as grocery delivery from trusted supermarkets and stores near you. Whether you're craving a delicious meal, need fresh groceries, or require pharmacy essentials, Foodelo brings it all straight to your doorstep.


Our app makes ordering food and groceries online seamless with just a few taps. Browse an extensive selection of local restaurants, grocery stores, and pharmacies, and enjoy a fast delivery service wherever you are.


Available in Nigeria (Lagos, Abeokuta) & Maryland, USA (Laurel, Bowie).


Why Choose Foodelo?


Fast & Reliable Food Delivery.
Enjoy quick food delivery from top-rated restaurants in Lagos, Abeokuta, and Maryland (USA). Whether you're in Ikeja, Lekki, Victoria Island, Surulere, Yaba, or Bowie, MD, get your meals and groceries delivered in minutes.


Grocery & Supermarket Delivery.
No time for shopping? Get your daily essentials, fresh produce, and household items from trusted grocery stores. Order online and receive same-day grocery delivery at your convenience.


Multi-Restaurant Checkout – Order from More Than One Place!
Easily compare meals from different restaurants on a single page before placing your order. No more switching between multiple listings—Foodelo makes food ordering simple and convenient.


Spin the Wheel & Win Rewards!
Feeling lucky? Play Foodelo’s Spin-the-Wheel game for a chance to win exclusive discounts, free meals, and cashback rewards.


Schedule Deliveries in Advance.
Want your food or groceries at a specific time? Foodelo lets you schedule deliveries for added convenience.


Send Food & Grocery Gifts.
Surprise friends and family with a delicious meal or grocery package! Foodelo makes gift deliveries easy and convenient.


Track Your Order in Real-Time.
Stay updated from the moment your order is placed until it arrives. Our live order tracking ensures you know exactly where your food or groceries are at all times.


Earn Rewards & Discounts.
Enjoy exclusive discounts, cashback, and loyalty rewards when you order through Foodelo. Plus, invite friends and earn extra benefits!


Where We Deliver:


Currently, Foodelo operates in Nigeria and the USA, covering the following locations:


Nigeria:
Lagos - Ikeja, Magodo, Yaba, Surulere, Lekki, Victoria Island, Ikoyi, and more.


Abeokuta - Agbomeji, Ago-Oko, Asero, GRA, Ibara, Iberekodo, Idiaba, Kuto, and more.


USA:
Maryland - Laurel & Bowie.


We are continuously expanding—stay tuned for new delivery areas!


Download Foodelo Now & Enjoy Fast Food & Grocery Delivery!
- Browse multiple restaurants on one page.
- Get groceries & household essentials delivered.
- Play & win rewards with Spin-the-Wheel!
- Track your order in real-time.
- Earn rewards & get discounts on every order.


Download Foodelo today and experience hassle-free food & grocery delivery!

Website - https://www.foodelo.africa

Instagram - @foodelo_ng

Twitter - @foodelo_ng

[:mav: 2.2.0]

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797

developer: PIZZA HUT MENAPAK S A R L DUBAI BRANCH
description:
Introducing the ultimate Pizza Hut Africa App – No one outpizzas the Hut! 

With our app, you can easily browse and order from our extensive menu of delicious pizzas, including all your favorite crust options. Our user-friendly interface makes it simple to customize your order to your exact specifications, ensuring that you get the perfect pizza every time. 

But our app isn't just about ordering pizza - it's also packed with great features and functionalities to enhance your overall experience. Here are just a few of the things you can do with our app: 

· Find your nearest store: Our app uses your location to find the nearest store, so you can easily order from the location that's most convenient for you. 

· Get exclusive deals: Our app users get access to exclusive deals and discounts that aren't available anywhere else. Be sure to check the app regularly for the latest offers! 

· Easy re-order: Our app users can repeat their favorite orders with just few simple steps. 

Download the Pizza Hut Africa app today and start enjoying the best pizza experience around!

Wakafoods – Fast & Reliable Food Delivery at Your Fingertips!

Craving your favorite meal? Wakafoods connects you to top restaurants, fast food outlets, local vendors, and street food sellers, delivering delicious meals straight to your doorstep!

Why Choose Wakafoods?
- Multiple Food Choices – Browse a variety of cuisines from different vendors.
- Easy Ordering – Select your restaurant, pick your meal, and confirm availability before payment.
- Flexible Delivery Options – Choose between pickup or delivery by Wakafoods or vendors.
- Real-Time Chat & Call – Contact vendors directly to confirm menu availability.
- Secure Payments – Pay safely with multiple payment options.

Download Wakafoods now and enjoy fast, easy, and reliable food delivery!

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

When you want pizza, you really want pizza. Luckily, our app is the quickest and easiest way to order one with a whole host of exclusive features. Want to know more? Course you do…


ORDER PIZZA

Scroll through our easy-order menu and treat yourself to an all-time classic or discover something new! You can even Create Your Own customised creation, give it a name and save it for next time. 


DELIVERY OR TAKEAWAY

Whether you want to collect from your local store or have your pizza delivered to your door, our app’s got you covered. With stores up and down the country, you’re sure to find a Domino’s Pizza near you. 


EXCLUSIVE PIZZA DEALS

If deals are your thing, you’ve come to the right place (almost). Download our app and you’ll find dozens of exclusive pizza deals to suit any budget (and any occasion). You can even add your vouchers to bag discounts on your order!


GROUP ORDERING

If you need to order pizza for the whole fam, you can set up a group order to make ordering for the gang a doddle. Just send them an invite, let them choose what they want and it’ll get added to the order! 


PRE-ORDERING

If you know you want pizza later, but you’re ready to order now…no worries. Get your order in early, let us know when you want it, and we’ll do the rest. Oh, and if you know you want the same as last time, you can just choose it from your order history! 


PAYMENT

Oh, and when it comes to settling up, you can pay pretty much however you like…using card, PayPal or with just a few taps thanks to Apple Pay. Plus, you can keep an eye on your pizza’s progress with our trusty pizza tracker.
 

So, if you haven’t downloaded our app yet, you’re missing out on everything you love about Domino’s and so much more. 

Hit the link to download now and see it with your own eyes!

By downloading and using this app, you confirm that you accept our Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy too.

UK
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/termsandconditions
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/privacypolicy
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/cookiepolicy

Ireland
https://www.dominos.ie/legal/content/termsandconditions
https://www.dominos.ie/legal/content/privacypolicy
https://www.dominos.ie/legal/content/cookiepolicy

This is swirl & indulgence in your pocket. With a few taps on your phone or computer, get ready to take your taste bud to a whole new level of deliciousness right from the comfort of your home, office, school… we mean everywhere!!!
It’s truly indulgence in your pocket as ordering for your favourite treats from Cold Stone Creamery & Pinkberry Gourmet Frozen Yoghurt just got a lot more convenient.  You can now order any ice cream dessert and frozen yoghurt of your choice and have it delivered to you within 25 minutes with just a few taps of your phone. 

Whether you are you a fit fam or food lover, this App guarantees easy access to as much as one million different mix-in combinations of your favorite, smooth, creamy, yummy ice cream flavours and our PB KAFE menu containing a perfect balance of yummy and healthy treats created from Pinkberry’s passion to help you discover new and exciting ways to enjoy yoghurt and healthy snacks in their daily routine. 
So, no matter what you crave, there is always a cup for you! Each unique flavour is made with love and is guaranteed to make you come running back for more.
Download the App today and celebrate every occasion with Cold Stone Creamery and Pinkberry Gourmet Frozen Yoghurt. We will deliver to your doorstep for FREE

The hours of operation may vary by stores. ENG reserves the right to make unannounced price changes. Our delivery is absolutely free. Please note that checks or bank transfers are not acceptable as payment method. The data provided by customers will be included in the user and promotional database, owned by Eat N Go Ltd. Prices include VAT & other taxes.

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!
